item.title: Emacs Hugo Blogging
item.description:
ID: 0dacbf0d-550d-4db9-8e15-6ffcede1107c

Hugo blogging

<0d/acbf0d-550d-4db9-8e15-6ffcede1107c/_20200426_045146screenshot.png>

Liked themes:

  1. Meme theme
  2. Harbor
  3. Cortex –JethroKuan
  4. Hello friend ng rhazdon
  5. Beautiful Hugo
  • Blogging org mode Font

  • Font: Source Code Pro : big size : Looks amazing: Is in google fonts as well

    //fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto+Slab:700,300,400|Source+Code+Pro:500 //maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.3.0/css/font-awesome.min.css

  • Normalize css : I don’t know what it does but looks pretty cool with all these stars on github.

    I think I have a faint idea now about what it does. It actually makes sure all line heights and stuffs look all the same whatever the browser may be.
